review:
Dr. Kiran Dua is a highly ******** experienced and compassionate gynecologist who supported us throughout our pregnancy and delivery journey. Dr. Dua's exceptional care and dedication have left a lasting impression on us.

From the initial consultation to the delivery of our baby, Dr. Dua demonstrated care, expertise, and a genuine commitment to our well-being. 
Her compassionate approach and exceptional bedside manner were evident from the first appointment. She took the time to listen attentively to our concerns, answer our questions, and provide us with clear explanations. Her ability to create a comfortable and supportive environment made our entire experience positive and reassuring.

She consistently went above and beyond to provide comprehensive care and support. Her availability and willingness to address any concerns or questions we had during the pregnancy and postpartum period were invaluable. She ensured that we felt supported and well-informed at all times.

Dr. Dua's genuine care and empathy have made a significant impact on our journey to parenthood. Her positive and comforting demeanor put us at ease, and she always made us feel heard and valued as patients. Her guidance and encouragement throughout the process were truly remarkable and greatly appreciated.

We are immensely grateful for the exceptional care Dr. Kiran Dua provided during our pregnancy and delivery. We highly recommend Dr. Dua to anyone in search of a dedicated and supportive gynecologist.

***** *** ** *** **** * **** **** ** never felt like a doctor patient relationship but like someone we had known since forever. As a doctor she had the most keen eye for detail and prescribed me the right medicines during my pregnancy. No matter at what time I messaged her whenever she would see the msg she would reply promptly and being my first pregnancy I was always anxious but she always had a soothing reply. She never advised unnecessary check ups or meetings. She ensured I had a normal delivery even though I was so close to giving up. Thank you so much Ma’m you’re an angel. Doctors like you are very few.
